page.title: 14WOMERTON HILL FARM
page.content: {Mr.Coleman}owns a{sheep farm}high up on the Longmynd.His farm nestles in a small valley,sheltered from the wind and storms.It is{colder}high up on the Longmynd than it is in Shrewsbury.The snow stays on the ground longer,and quite often he is cut off from other people.He can't grow any crops except grass because the soil is too thin.The rain washes the soil down the hill to the lucky farmers at the bottom. Mr.Coleman likes living where he does. He enjoys the{peace}of the countryside, and he loves his animals. He has made a beautiful garden which is protected from the weather by the farm buildings and the hills around the farm.
